actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service Discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Received in the Senate and held at the desk by unanimous consent. Until the close of business September 18, 1984.
Passed Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A joint resolution designating the week of September 16 through 22, 1984 as "Emergency Medicine Week".

summary.text: Designates the week of September 16 through September 22, 1984, as Emergency Medicine Week.

titles.title: A joint resolution designating the week of September 16 through 22, 1984 as "Emergency Medicine Week".
